s: Amazon Hub Locker is a secure, self-serve, fully automated kiosk providing a convenient delivery solution for customers to pick up their Amazon packages. Lockers are available in a variety of sizes to meet the needs of your business.
Amazon Locker provides you with a self-service delivery location to collect your Amazon.com packages.

s: Fridge Locker secures lunch, sweets, drinks, snacks or just about anything. Keep your food safe from Refrig-A-Raiders at home, office or dorm with your very own personal food security system. The portable design allows you to take your Fridge locker anywhere.

March 24, 2025 - A parcel locker is an automated postal box that allows users for a self-service collection of parcels and oversize letters as well as the dispatch of parcels. Amazon Locker is a self-service package delivery service of parcel lockers offered by online retailer Amazon.
